translation.en: -I brought you this. -[girl] Awesome, Mom. Thank you so much.
-[woman 1] Yeah, of course. -Sleeping in the car.
I should have something for you by the end of the week.
[woman 2] I have a church meeting tonight. Can you keep 'em until 7:00?
translation.ko: 저녁에 교회 모임 있으니까 7시까지 데리고 올래?

translation.en: Maybe they could stay the night?
-[woman 2] You're welcome to join us. -I'll think about it.
translation.ko: - 너도 같이 가면 좋고 - 생각해 볼게요

translation.en: So, how was school this week?
-Did you know birds come from dinosaurs? -[woman 1] I did.
translation.ko: - 공룡이 새의 조상인 거 알아요? - 그럼

translation.en: -Why are we even doing this? -[woman 1] I'm tired, Noah. Okay?
translation.ko: - 우리 뭣 하러 억지로 만나요? - 엄마 피곤해

translation.en: I just worked the night shift,
and I'm doing everything I can to get you guys back. All right? So...
translation.ko: 난 너희 둘을 되찾기 위해 최선을 다하고 있으니까...

translation.en: [Noah] I don't want you to feel bad, but I don't want to pretend that...
translation.ko: 초 치고 싶진 않지만 친한 척 연기해 봤자...

translation.en: What did you do? -Nothing, I-- -[tires squealing]
-What do we do? -[woman 1] Come to me. Quick!
You okay? Are you all right? Take off your seat belt right now.
translation.ko: - 다친 데는 없니? - 네 - 안전벨트 풀어 - 네

translation.en: It's okay, I'm right here. Everything's gonna be okay.
Come towards Mommy. Okay, right now!
Come towards Mommy. Quick! I need you to go faster, baby.
translation.ko: 이리 와, 어서! 빨리 움직여, 아가

translation.en: -Come on, it's gonna be okay. Go! -[Matilda] Mom!
-Come on, Noah. Get out! -I can't! My belt's stuck!
translation.ko: - 노아, 어서 나가! - 안전벨트가 안 빠져요

translation.en: [sheriff] She was out for a minute, but she's gonna be fine.
-[sheriff] She's good. She's good. -Thank you. Thank you.
-[sheriff] I don't know what happened. -Oh. Oh, baby.
I don't think we're gonna get an ambulance here,
but the VA Hospital's just four blocks away, and... you're gonna need stitches.
translation.ko: 네 블록만 가면 보훈병원이니까 가서 상처를 꿰매세요

translation.en: [nurse] I'll be right there. Uh, Exam Room 3.
Hey, excuse me. Um, I need a doctor.
Um, uh, we just got into a car accident and my daughter was, uh, spitting up water.
translation.ko: 조금 전 교통사고가 나서 딸애가 잠시 의식을 잃었죠

translation.en: -[woman 1] Wh-- Hey! Hey! -[nurse 1] I need some help here!
It's a terrorist attack, for sure.
Terrorists? Able to shut off all the power...
-to cars? -Maybe it was the Chinese, right?
They built all this shit so maybe they just turned it all off.
translation.ko: 자기들이 일군 온 세상을 단번에 꺼 버린 거예요

translation.en: Maybe they blew up New York and LA, and we're next.
translation.ko: 놈들이 뉴욕과 LA를 날리고 우리를 노리는 거예요

translation.en: -[patient screaming] -[nurse 2] I gave him ten cc's.
-That should put down a rhino! -[woman 3] Someone!
[Doris] The phones aren't working, the power's out--
-Hey, Doris, you good on meds? -[Doris] I got plenty.
The store's not taking credit cards.
Do you have cash for food?
The cash was in the car. In the lake.
I-- I can see if I can pick something up on the way home from the university.
translation.ko: 상황 봐서 퇴근길에 음식 좀 사 올게요

translation.en: I'm in at 6:00 a.m. tomorrow. I just need to get a little sleep.
Yeah. They don't have power. They're gonna need security.
You know, there's no point in you walking home.
Why don't you spend the night?
[Doris] I don't know how you sleep like that.
You know when you wake up in the morning, everything is good for a minute
translation.ko: 아침에 눈 뜨면 기분 나쁜 일들이 떠오르기 전에

translation.en: I get that minute when I meditate.
I tried yoga when my hip started hurting, but...
translation.ko: 난 요가를 했었어 골반 통증 때문에 근데 딱히 효과가 없었지
골반 통증 때문에 근데 딱히 효과가 없었지

translation.en: You have a little something to help me sleep?
translation.ko: 도움이 될 만한 거 혹시 갖고 있니?

translation.en: You know the judge said that I wasn't allowed.
Well, I guess you really aren't using if you're awake too.
translation.ko: 너도 깨어 있는 걸 보니 거짓말은 아닌 거 같구나

translation.en: I'll stop at the pharmacy and get you something.
translation.ko: 약국 들러서 필요하신 거 사 올게요

translation.en: [woman 1] Why don't you get some sleep?
Look at all the shooting stars.
-Hey, hey, hey, I need more stuff. -Relax, okay?
translation.ko: - 어이, 물건이 더 필요해 - 천천히 말해

translation.en: Downers, benzos, phennies, tooies, red jackets, people are crazy right now,
translation.ko: 진정제나 안정제, 수면제도 좋아 다들 미쳐 날뛰고 있어

translation.en: amped up. That shit'll be, like, gold. I'll double the price.
translation.ko: 흥분 상태라 약이 금값일 거야 두 배로 쳐 줄게

translation.en: No, fuck, I didn't say that.
Yeah. Yeah, you did say that.
All right. I'll do it. Fucking Gregg's a man of his word, all right?
translation.ko: 좋아 난 뱉은 말은 꼭 지키는 놈이거든

translation.en: Cash in, cash out. Cycle of life.
I'll double the price on all types of zombie pills. Come on.
translation.ko: 잠 오는 약이라면 뭐든 두 배로 쳐 줄게

translation.en: [woman 4] How'd you get your cars to run, huh?
translation.ko: 어찌 된 거예요? 차를 어떻게 움직였죠? 우리 차는 꼼짝도 안 하는데요

translation.en: How come our cars aren't working? What the fuck is going on?
translation.ko: 차를 어떻게 움직였죠? 우리 차는 꼼짝도 안 하는데요 대체 무슨 일이죠?

translation.en: Easy. I'm 68 Whiskey. Corporal Adams. Out of Fort Huachuca.
translation.ko: 난 의무병이에요 포트 후아추카의 애덤스 상병이죠

translation.en: What are you doing up here?
Not active anymore. I mean, I might be.
I don't know. They call in reserves yet? I just don't know.
That's a lot of pills, Jill.
I can explain. It's not what it looks like, I promise.
-[woman 5] Pack those up for me, please. -[Jill] Yes, ma'am.
I know you stuck your neck out for me to get this job, and I am so appreciative,
translation.ko: 위험을 무릅쓰고 절 취직시켜 주신 거 더없이 감사해요 제가 일을 망쳐서...

translation.en: -and-- and I know I screwed up-- -I don't care.
translation.ko: 더없이 감사해요 제가 일을 망쳐서... 상관없어

translation.en: Was that an EMP yesterday? Are we at war?
People are saying it's been happening all over. Who would we even attack?

translation.ko: - 머피 소령님 - 하드 드라이브는 못 써요

translation.en: Hard drives are useless. Anything with a microchip is fried.
translation.ko: - 머피 소령님 - 하드 드라이브는 못 써요 마이크로 칩이 있는 건 죄다 타 버렸죠

translation.en: Here's everything I have on hard copy.
We were the "get answers" people over there. They need those people again.
translation.ko: 예전처럼 다시 우리가 앞장서서 해답을 찾아야 해

translation.en: This is the location of the hub.
I'd like you to get Lori and my children, and...
get down there as soon as you can, all right?
[man 3] You don't understand how serious this is.
You should have gone with her.
How is Murphy gonna bring the power back? She's a psychiatrist.
translation.ko: 정신과 의사인 머피가 어떻게 전기를 되살리죠?

translation.en: There are contingencies for that. Replace enough wires and fuses...
translation.ko: 전기라면 대책이 있죠 전선과 퓨즈를 교체하면 되니까요

translation.en: [exhaling] After 48 hours of no sleep, there's a loss of critical thinking.
translation.ko: 48시간 동안 잠을 못 자면 비판적 사고가 흐려져요

translation.en: But what about after that? Organs will fail but then what?
translation.ko: 그 후엔 어떨까요? 장기가 멈추죠, 그다음에는요?

translation.en: Days of lying in paralysis until the heart shuts off?
translation.ko: 심장이 멎을 때까지 마비된 채로 뻗어 있겠죠

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I know what happens.
Symptoms are appearing two to three times quicker.
translation.ko: 증상이 두세 배 정도 빠르게 나타나요

translation.en: It's gonna be total chaos. We're not all going to die.
translation.ko: - 최악의 난장판이 펼쳐지겠죠 - 다 죽진 않을 거예요

translation.en: -Well, this is not happening to everyone. -Yes, it is.
translation.ko: - 누구나 해당되는 건 아니잖아요 - 누구나 마찬가지죠

translation.en: Well, there is this one woman who can sleep.
translation.ko: 잠들 수 있는 여자가 한 명 있기는 해요

translation.en: They're bringing her to this hub.
Matilda was sleeping too. My daughter was sleeping.
translation.ko: 마틸다도 잘 수 있어요 내 딸도 잔다고요

translation.en: Jill, they're setting up a whole station based on this one sleeper.
translation.ko: 잠들 수 있는 여자를 중심으로 허브를 세우고 있어요

translation.en: That's how big of a deal she is.
Are you sure your daughter was sleeping?
Oh, I-I... I got into a car accident,
-but I'm fine. -Was your daughter also hurt?
I'm just saying, odds are she wasn't sleeping.
What, do you think she's unconscious?
There are no such thing as unconscious people anymore.
translation.ko: 의식을 잃은 사람은 더 이상 없어요

translation.en: Where is she? Where is she? Where is she?
Where is your sister? Where is your sister? You're hurting me!
Where-- Where is Matilda? Is she okay?
Church. Grandma took her to church.
Maybe we are meant to be awake.
translation.ko: 우리가 깨어 있는 건 운명일 겁니다

translation.en: 'Cause you need to be woke to see how the world really is.
translation.ko: 세상의 참모습을 확인하려면 깨어 있어야 하니까요

translation.en: And the Lord says, "Come to me, all who labor
translation.ko: 주님께서 말씀하셨죠 '수고하고 무거운 짐 진 자들아'

translation.en: and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest."
translation.ko: '다 내게로 오라 내가 너희를 쉬게 하리라'

translation.en: Only my dad called me that.
I'm sorry, I forgot. I'm just... tired.
asked to be called to God, you know.
I know that more than most because before I was a pastor...
translation.ko: 누구보다도 잘 알아 왜냐하면 난 목사가 되기 전에

translation.en: Covered up the evidence with a tattoo.
I mean, I should've died within hours, but I didn't.
translation.ko: 몇 시간 내로 죽어야 했지만 죽지 않았지

translation.en: I had built up such an immunity to narcotics over the years, I just...
laid there for three days in rest...
But I was only gone for a minute when they found me.
translation.ko: 사람들이 날 발견했을 때 잠시 숨이 끊긴 거지

translation.en: So, like Jesus, I... returned from the dead.
Now, I'm not comparing myself to Jesus. I just...
since that day, I dedicated my life to serving him.
translation.ko: 그날 이후로 난 인생을 주님을 섬기는 데 바쳤어

translation.en: it was a miracle that I survived, you know?
translation.ko: 내가 살아난 건 말 그대로 기적이었지

translation.en: And I think people really need a miracle right now.
You think I need to die?
It's just everyone is tired and... desperate, you know?
translation.ko: 모든 사람이 하나같이 지치고 절망에 빠진 상태야

translation.en: People just want to know if you can sleep.
It's just hard when I'm not tired.
Would it be okay if I prayed with you?
A lot of children say my prayers are so boring, they nod right off.
translation.ko: 애들 말로는 내 기도가 지루해서 금세 졸립대

translation.en: Lord, we thank you for this day and we thank you for Matilda.
translation.ko: 주님, 오늘 하루와 마틸다에 대해 감사드립니다

translation.en: Uh, no, it's a test for mental sharpness.
translation.ko: 그게 아니라 정신이 온전한지 시험하는 거야

translation.en: -[Noah] How'd you do? -I-I got two wrong. It's fine.
Uh, we need to go and find a car, and get your sister somewhere safe, okay?
translation.ko: 나가서 차를 찾은 다음에 동생을 안전한 데로 옮기자

translation.en: -Cars don't work, Jill. -[sighing] Some do, Noah. Okay?
translation.ko: - 차도 꼼짝 안 하죠 - 굴러가는 차도 있어

translation.en: So, can you just help me out, please?

translation.ko: - 젠장, 깜짝이야! - 당신 딸요 - 잠들 수 있어요? - 네?

translation.en: She can't sleep? Is she okay?
No, she's fine, she's fine. I was wrong. She was just pretending.
translation.ko: 멀쩡해요, 내 실수였어요 자는 척하는 거였죠

translation.en: Jesus, Jill, we need to get your daughter to Murphy.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 질 애를 박사님께 데려가야 해요

translation.en: -Look, she could be key. -Noah, we gotta go.
I know where the hub is.
They're setting up a station to help solve this.
Look, they already have this one sleeper.
translation.ko: 잠들 수 있는 사람이 한 명 있어요

translation.en: Brian, we're not going there. Come on. Noah, let's go.
translation.ko: 브라이언, 우린 거기 안 가요 노아, 빨리 가자

translation.en: [Jill yelling] Hey! Yo, that's my bike!
[pastor] In our basement, like an angel of peace, a young girl sleeps.
translation.ko: 교회 지하실에 평화의 천사 같은 여자아이가 자고 있어요

translation.en: So if she can sleep, -that means we can too. -[people murmuring]
translation.ko: 우리도 그 애처럼 잠들 수 있다는 뜻이죠

translation.en: So, as all mankind lays awake, we pray for answers.
translation.ko: 모든 인류가 깨어 있는 동안 해답을 위해 기도합시다

translation.en: So what if she can sleep?
Just like good grows, if you believe in it,
if you give it a fighting chance.
[man 5] There is no over-the-counter sleeping pills left.
[man 6] Give us the stuff behind the counter!
translation.ko: - 카운터 뒤에 숨긴 거 내놔요 - 병원에 가서

translation.en: [man 5] You'll have to talk to your doctors. Get the notes.
translation.ko: - 카운터 뒤에 숨긴 거 내놔요 - 병원에 가서 처방전을 받아 와요

translation.en: [man 6] You know no doctor's answering his phone. Please, I can't help you!
It's only going to get worse.
Your mind will bend and bend until it breaks.
But it's adversity that prompts us to change
translation.ko: 인생이 정체될 때 우리에게 변화를 촉구하는 것이 바로 역경이죠
우리에게 변화를 촉구하는 것이 바로 역경이죠

translation.en: So then we embrace it. [Jim] Pastor...
-Matilda... -When are you gonna make us sleep?
-Patience, please. -[man 7] I don't have patience right now.
Raymond isn't responding. He's eating but not talking.
translation.ko: 레이먼드가 이상해요 먹긴 하는데 말이 없죠

translation.en: -He's tired, just like the rest of us. -He's beyond tired.
-He'll be fine. -[woman 6] We should sacrifice her.
translation.ko: - 괜찮을 겁니다 - 저 애를 희생해야 해요

translation.en: God sacrificed Jesus, his own son, to save us.
translation.ko: 하나님은 우릴 구원하려고 자신의 아들 예수를 희생하셨죠

translation.en: God willingly sacrificed himself for our sins.
translation.ko: 예수님은 우리 죄를 위해 기꺼이 희생하셨지만

translation.en: There is no sacrifice needed. We... We only need prayer.
translation.ko: 희생은 필요치 않습니다 우리의 기도로 충분해요

translation.en: God help me, I'm willing to be Pontius Pilate
translation.ko: 주여, 제가 본디오 빌라도가 되어 저 애를 벌하겠습니다
주여, 제가 본디오 빌라도가 되어 저 애를 벌하겠습니다 로버트, 앉아요 어서요! 그만해요

translation.en: -[pastor] That's enough. -[man 7] What good is prayer?
translation.ko: 로버트, 앉아요 어서요! 그만해요 기도가 무슨 소용이죠? 우린 자야 해요
기도가 무슨 소용이죠? 우린 자야 해요

translation.en: Jill, we just wanted to pray with Matilda, that's it.
She can sleep. Maybe she can help. Lord knows we all need help right now.
translation.ko: 잠드는 능력이 도움이 될 거예요 모두 도움이 필요한 때죠

translation.en: Come on. Matilda is my daughter, and she's coming with me.
translation.ko: 마틸다는 내 딸이고 나랑 같이 갈 거예요

translation.en: -[woman 7] Not legally, she ain't. -Please, sit-- sit down.
Doris... Doris takes care of those kids by law.
But right now, with what's happening,
I can help, and you know I can help.
translation.ko: 제가 도울 수 있는 거 아시잖아요

translation.en: -[Jill] Okay, come on, Matilda. Let's go. -[Jim] She has to stay here.
translation.ko: - 마틸다, 엄마랑 가자 - 여기 있어야 해요

translation.en: [Brian] We're on the same team here.
[Brian] But she can't help anyone here.
Right now, your brains are slowly swelling.
Our cranial walls are impressing on the brain,
It's what happens when we don't sleep.
Now, the more excited we get,
the more blood flows to the brain, the worse we are.
So, the best thing we can do right now...
Now, we're gathering scientists and doctors to help solve this.
translation.ko: 문제를 해결하려고 과학자들과 의사들을 모으는 중이에요

translation.en: And all they need is the girl.
No one dismisses the value of science,
but neither is she a test subject to run experiments on...
translation.ko: 저 애는 이용해도 되는 실험 대상이 아니에요

translation.en: -You're not taking her anywhere. -[pastor] Jim, please.
-[woman 10] That's right. -Prayers are not gonna save--
if you don't hand her over, I'll be back with the Army,
translation.ko: 그 애를 안 넘기면 군대를 끌고 오겠어

translation.en: and they're not gonna ask nicely.
-You calm down! -[Brian] Is that what you want?
Because unless you people wake up, that is exactly what is gonna happen.
translation.ko: 정신 차리지 않으면 정확히 그렇게 될 거야

translation.en: [woman 7] Doris took her down the back.
Noah, Noah, look at me. You're gonna be okay. All right?
translation.ko: 노아, 엄마를 봐 넌 괜찮을 거야

translation.en: I need you to meet me in the forest out back. I'm gonna get your sister.
-[man 9] Bring her out! -[man 10] Get her out here!
translation.ko: 애를 끌어내! 여기 없어 남자끼리 뭉쳐서 찾아내자

translation.en: [man 9] She's not in there. Get the guys. Let's look out back.
[Doris] She's not in there? She was.
translation.ko: - 어디 있어요? - 안에 없어요? 거기 있었는데

translation.en: This isn't Jesus rising from the tomb, Doris.
translation.ko: 예수님이 무덤에서 깨어나는 소리 말고, 어디 있죠?

translation.en: This is not who we are.
Oh, my God, my baby. -Oh, baby. Oh, baby. -[Matilda whimpering]
-Grandma told me to run, but I couldn't. -Oh, that's okay.
translation.ko: - 할머니 말대로 뛸 수가 없었어요 - 괜찮아

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Oh. No, I'm fine, baby. I'm fine.
-Put it down. -[Jim] We can't let her leave.
translation.ko: - 총 내려요 - 걜 놓치면 안 돼요

translation.en: Jim, put it-- put it down, please. You're scaring everyone.
translation.ko: 짐, 총을 내려놔요 다들 겁에 질렸잖아요

translation.en: Your grandmother can't run, okay? She has a condition.
translation.ko: 할머니는 못 뛰셔 건강이 안 좋으시지

translation.en: No, no, no, no. She's gonna be fine. -I need you to keep up with me, okay? -Okay.

translation.en: [Jill] We're gonna need a car. You stay here.
translation.ko: 차가 있어야 해 너희는 여기서 기다려

translation.en: -You don't know what they're capable of. -But we need to find a cure.
translation.ko: 무슨 짓을 당할지 몰라 치료제를 찾아야죠

translation.en: It-- It's right here, wherever this-- this is.
translation.ko: 여기 쪽지가 있어요 위치는 잘 모르지만요

translation.en: I touched a dead body to get this. A dead body!
we both die, and she lives alone?
That's the stupidest thing I've ever heard.
-Burn it. Burn this, and we can't go. -Noah, stop that.
translation.ko: - 아예 못 가게 태워 버리자 - 노아, 그만해

translation.en: If we're all gone, she'll be dead within days.

translation.en: There's another woman there already. They're gonna find a cure. They will.

translation.en: -[man 12] Idiot! It's gotta be an old car. -[soft thud]
Okay, can we focus? Get that Camry started?
World's in chaos and you're wasting time stomping heads.

translation.en: Why can't we do the Beemer?
[man 12] This is the last time I tell you.
We need an old car. No electronics.

translation.en: It had no battery in it when whatever the fuck was happening...

translation.en: The Camaro or the Dodge should work with one of the older batteries.

translation.en: Get in. Give it a shot.
-[man 11] Tell me when you're ready. -[man 12] Yeah.
[man 11] There it is. Told you we could boost the battery.
-[man 12] Sweet! -[man 11] Go get the keys for the Dodge.
And grab the battery we brought up from the basement!
-I don't want a Polara. I want a Camaro. -[man 11] Just grab the keys, pendejo.
translation.ko: - 폴라라는 됐고 카마로로 할래 - 열쇠나 챙겨요, 꼰대 양반

translation.en: [man 12] They're in here somewhere. You find 'em.
-Yo, you hear that? -[car accelerating in the distance]
Someone else got a car running, too.

translation.en: Man, they were stocked up. Medical shit.
Bet they could sleep with that.
[man 11] Grab all the keys. We'll come back for the Dodge later.

translation.en: So, what happened with this girlfriend?
We're-- We're not going to talk about this right now.
translation.ko: 지금 그 얘기 할 생각 없어요

translation.en: Noah, come on. I basically-- I basically had you when I was your age.
translation.ko: 노아, 이러지 마 난 네 나이 때 널 임신했는걸

translation.en: We do not need to have this conversation.
-But you can talk to me if you-- -[Noah] Are we done?
Those were Murphy's guys that shot up that car.

translation.en: She helped me get a job at the university and...
translation.ko: 내가 대학 경비 일을 하게 도와줬지

translation.en: The kind of things that we would do to try to find answers, it's not human.
translation.ko: 답을 얻으려고 물불 안 가렸지만 그건 인간이 할 짓이 아니야

translation.en: Are we still going to the hub?
We're gonna need, like, a book on mapping.
I-- I want to make sure that you understand how this works, okay?

translation.en: Mom, I know how a library works.
Yeah. The computers don't work anymore, so...
This is gonna be your new school.

translation.en: So, when mommy's gone, you'll need to find a library.

translation.en: Okay? And... read. Don't stop reading, and I...
...and I need you to learn as much as you can, okay?
Um, come with me over here.
Okay, look at me. I'm gonna teach you something very important, okay?

translation.en: And, look at me, not just for people, but for animals too. All right?

translation.en: And we're gonna find you a rifle,
and you're gonna learn how to shoot that too,
because the world is different now, baby, okay?

translation.en: And you gotta be prepared for anything.

translation.ko: 알았지? 잘 들어, 두 손으로 총을 잡아

translation.en: Put two hands on the gun for me. There you go.

translation.en: Hold onto it strong just like the handlebars of your bike.

translation.en: Put this foot forward. There we go. Nice strong stance, okay?

translation.en: Keep both eyes open. And you see that eye groove?

-Yes, Matilda! -We're gonna find a cure, okay?

translation.en: And you and Noah are gonna shoot the gun.
-Oh. -[crying] I'm going to the car. Wait, baby. Baby, come--

translation.en: I was here. I said I was here.
You said to find books on mapping.
Just don't shoot at me again, okay?
[Noah] I think the coordinates lead here.
I think it's 150 miles. I don't know. We haven't slept in four days.

translation.en: I'm not stopping. I'm gonna hit you. I'm not stopping.
Hey, I ain't gonna hurt you.
Just, hey, let me have the boy.
No, you can go. I'll let you go. Hey, give me the boy.

translation.en: I'll let you-- I'll let you go.
I'm just messing around. I'm messing around.
We're all free men here. It's all good.
Hey, can I-- Can I have that gun?
Noah, I'm gonna shoot at one.
They're gonna scatter. You're gonna go inside and lock yourself in, okay?

translation.en: -Noah! -Hey, give me-- Give me the gun.
Yeah, run, Noah, you pretty little bitch.
-Who are you? -[man 15] Why does it matter?
-I said, "What's your name?" -Dodge! Dodge, call me Dodge.
How did you get out, Dodge?
I was locked in the cells, guards were gone, okay?
We were starving, and I thought that, you know, I was gonna die in there.

translation.en: And then the guards came back and opened the cell.
-[Jill] You just walked out? -Yeah, I just walked out.

There are no bullets in that.
There are no bullets in that gun.
I keep the keys. And we need gas.
[Jill] Okay, that should be clean enough.
So, you saw I put it in the gas tank, right?

translation.en: And now I want you to just, um, suck on it like a straw,

translation.en: You're gonna put it in here, okay?
So your sister can sleep, huh?
in the war. Oh, he served.
Come on, you can do it.
Come on, you gotta learn, Matilda. You got this.

translation.en: -She thinks I don't know what she's doing. -A cure?
You guys are trying to find a cure?
You know, the funny thing is, I usually sleep, like,
two to three hours tops at night, but now, you know...

Okay, I was just telling you so you don't forget.

Fixing this car is gonna be so hard. Oh, man. Okay.

Not talk to her so she can concentrate, please.

translation.en: Then, they said the Earth was round...
[Dodge laughing] Science? And who understands the science, huh?
Eyes on the road, please, always.
[Dodge] Enough people talk about something, right? Then it becomes fact.

translation.en: Then they put it in the books, and then the book becomes fact.

translation.en: Then no one understands it anymore, no one even talks about it anymore.

translation.en: Fuck, this is why we gotta burn the books, man.

translation.en: You know, my grandmama, you know what she used to tell me?

translation.en: -Huh? -That all the world's problems could all disappear in one generation
translation.ko: 세상의 모든 문제를 한 세대 만에 없앨 수 있다셨죠

translation.en: if every kid grew up forgetting all the shit they were taught,
translation.ko: 누구나 어른이 되면 그간 배운 말도 안 되지만

translation.en: the shit that doesn't make sense,
but you're taught it enough times, you believe it.
Then we can actually live in a world
I used to think she was crazy, though, Grandma.
maybe she was on to something.
-Watch out. You see that there? -[Matilda] Yeah.
Go right around the car, just like that.
Slow down. Slow down, put the brake on.
Let's go, let's go, let's go, right now! Put your head down, Matilda!
Whoa, whoa, whoa, why're you stopping the car? -You see those lights ahead? -[engine idling]

translation.en: We have to get off the road.
Are you guys sure you don't want me to stick around
and maybe help with whatever y'all are doing?
No, you go to where you need to get.
It's time for me to get the fuck out of Dodge.
Hey, why'd we stop at this place?
I'm gonna just go first, okay? Make sure it's safe.

translation.en: If I don't come back, I want you to stay in this house, okay?

translation.en: There's enough food to last you about a week.
[whispering] It's just in case. It's just in case.
And if anyone comes, I want you to hide.
It's just in-- It's just in case. It's just in case.

[special op 1] I'll take them up. You watch the bridge.
-[woman 13] I can't do this. -[man 17] Just keep taking the meds.

약을 계속 먹으면 도움이 될 거예요

translation.en: [man 17] Ah, shit, what was the code? I wrote it down.
Where's the woman, uh, that can sleep?

translation.en: Yeah, I need blood-- I need to take blood samples.
How much blood can you take from me?
It's okay, I'm not gonna hurt you.
Good. I can help you with that.
You need to raise my daughter.
I have a little girl. She's ten years old,
and she needs you to help her in the new world.
translation.ko: 새로운 세상에 적응하도록 그 애를 도와주세요

translation.en: She can't make it on her own.
She needs somebody to help her.
Okay? She needs someone to help her. You're the only one who can do it.

translation.en: In the next few days, the rest of us are gonna be dead, okay?
translation.ko: 앞으로 며칠이면 나머지는 모두 죽을 거예요

translation.en: I'm gonna take you out of here.
I'm the one that needs help.
[inhales deeply] I was supposed to be dead months ago.

translation.en: You're crazier than the rest of them.
After you left the campus, Brian helped me with the coordinates.
translation.ko: 박사님이 떠난 후 브라이언이 절 도운 것처럼요

translation.en: My family, are-- are they with you?
I'm-- I didn't see him again. So I'm assuming he was here.
translation.ko: 그 후로 안 보이길래 여기 있는 줄 알았는데

translation.en: It's been six days, and we're no closer.
We have, um, a cocktail that helps with mental acuity, but it's-- it's causing some...

translation.en: that none of us are gonna survive.
I mean, that must mean something.
get situated, and let's get to work.

I will shoot you in the fucking face!

had to ease the tension by...

translation.en: You're such a brave, sweet girl.

they were always closest to humans.

that you didn't tell me about Matilda
after all I've done for you.

How long have I been here?

some sort of a... a solar flare, we think.

Defib. Hey! I need your help! Okay. Okay, come on.

Where's Noah? We have to find him.
Dad taught me how to do this.
-You gut fish from the head to the tail. -Noah, don't touch that!
translation.ko: - 생선 내장을 뽑는 거지 - 오빠, 건들지 마

translation.en: Please wake up for me, please! Mom! Please, Noah, please! [grunting]
translation.ko: 제발 정신 차려 봐 엄마! 오빠 좀 살려 줘요

translation.en: Please wake up for me, all right? Wake up for me, please.
translation.ko: 정신 좀 차려 봐 엄마를 봐서 눈 떠

translation.en: Wake up! Mommy's here, wake up!
[Matilda] Okay. Okay, I got it. That's it. Turn it on. Put the pads on.
translation.ko: 이걸 가져왔어요 전원을 켜고 패드를 붙여요

translation.en: -[Jill panting] Okay. -[Matilda] Adjust. [Jill] I can't. -[Matilda] Okay.
-[Jill] I need help. -[Matilda] Come on! Come on!
about not wanting to come here.
to try to find someone to help Matilda.
Your heart wasn't beating, I listened to it.
And then when I got the defibrillator, I brought you back.
We don't have lots of time to discuss it. Mom's not gonna make it.
translation.ko: 그 얘기 할 때가 아니야 엄마가 못 버티겠어

translation.en: -What? -In the water, when the sheriff saved me.
I mean, there was nothing, absolutely nothing,
and then the sheriff was pushing on my chest, he was hurting me.
translation.ko: 보안관 아저씨가 가슴을 누르는 게 아팠어

translation.en: You have to trust me, Mom.
